schools.name: Lexington Jr High School
schools.school-summary: Lexington Jr High School, a public school located in Lexington, IL, serves grades 6-8 in the Lexington Community Unit School District 7.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 4 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Lexington High School
schools.school-summary: Lexington High School, a public school located in Lexington, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Lexington Community Unit School District 7.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 10 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Lexington Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Lexington Elementary School, a public school located in Lexington, IL, serves grades PK-5 in the Lexington Community Unit School District 7.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 8 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
